description: Try our easy to follow Thai Green Curry With Chicken And Asian Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Green Curry With Chicken And Asian Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 275g the spice tailor thai green curry kit
50g snow peas, sting removed if you like

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a pan and fry the extra chilli if you would like added heat, for 10 seconds.
Add the chicken pieces and sear all over.
Add the vegetables, except the bamboo shoots and saut√© for 4 minutes.

Add the green paste and stir well. Add the coconut milk, bamboo shoots, the aromatics from the spice pack and Thai basil (if using) and bring to a simmer. Cook until the vegetables and chicken are done  around 3-4 minutes more.
Taste, adjust seasoning and sweetness and serve.
